title: Navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the Paywall
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates around the page
custom_expected: THEN all buttons can be accessed AND all the navigation is as expected _Notes:_ The exact navigation is not documented

title: Skip Paywall
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the Purchase Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and activates the Skip for Now button
custom_expected: THEN the app will advance to Scores View

title: Yearly Purchase Terms of Subscription & Back via Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
custom_steps: When the user activates yearly purchase.
custom_expected:
THEN app shows the expected Terms Of Service text associated with Yearly Purchase
 AND all buttons can be selected/highlighted 
AND Menu on remote takes user back to Paywall Basic design (do not reference for syntax or copy) https://zpl.io/2EyQv7Y

title: Yearly Purchase- Cancel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
AND user has IAP iTunes sandbox test account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Yearly purchase 
AND Accepts Terms 
AND enters iTunes IAP test account 
AND then activates CANCEL
custom_expected:
THEN app shows a Purchase failed message 
AND when dismissed returns to the Paywall

title: Yearly Purchase - Cancel via Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)

custom_steps:

title: Yearly Purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the User is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
App launched after fresh install
User has advanced from Get Started to Purchase page
User has IAP iTunes sandbox test account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Yearly purchase 
AND accepts terms 
AND enters iTunes IAP test account/PW AND activates Buy
custom_expected:
THEN app jumps to Scores view 
AND user is entitled 
AND user can connect account in Settings

title: Yearly Purchase Terms of Subscription & Back via Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates Yearly Trial purchaseTHEN app shows the expected Terms Of Service text associated with Yearly Trial Purchase AND all buttons can be selected/highlighted AND Menu on remote takes user back to Paywall Basic design (do not reference for syntax or copy) https://zpl.io/2EyQv7Y

title: Yearly Trial Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
AND a yearly trial is available ***
AND user has IAP iTunes sandbox test account

*** If not available, try uninstalling and reinstalling app - options are targeted randomly.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Yearly Trial purchase 
And accepts terms 
AND enters iTunes IAP test account/PW 
AND activates Buy
custom_expected:
THEN app jumps to Scores view
AND user is entitled 
AND user can connect account in Settings

title: Monthly Purchase
custom_preconds:
User not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
App launched after fresh install
User has advanced from Get Started to Purchase page
User has IAP iTunes sandbox test account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Monthly purchase 
AND enters iTunes IAP test account/PW 
AND activates Buy
custom_expected:
THEN app jumps to Scores view 
AND user is entitled 
AND user can connect account in Settings NOTE: Monthly purchase is available during the season. During the off-season this option will not appear.

title: Monthly Trial Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
AND a monthly trial is available ***
AND user has IAP iTunes sandbox test account

*** If not available, try uninstalling and reinstalling app - options are targeted randomly. Also, Monthly not available in the offseason.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Monthly Trial purchase 
And accepts terms 
AND enters iTunes IAP test account/PW 
AND activates Buy
custom_expected:
THEN app jumps to Scores View 
AND user is entitled 
AND user can connect account in Settings

custom_steps: WHEN the user activates Monthly Trial purchase
custom_expected:

AND all buttons can be selected/highlighted 
AND BACK returns user to Paywall Basic design (do not reference for syntax or copy) https://zpl.io/2EyQv7Y

title: Terms of Service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates any purchase button AND clicks on "Terms of service"
custom_expected:
THEN app shows the expected Terms Of Service 
AND Close button can be selected/highlighted 
AND Close returns user to Paywall Basic design (do not reference for syntax or copy) https://zpl.io/aRo4LDr

custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in to MLB app (previous build) or a tvOS iTunes account (on device)
AND app is launched after fresh install
AND user has advanced to Paywall page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Monthly Trial purchase 
AND clicks on "Privacy Policy"
custom_expected:
THEN app shows the expected Privacy Policy 
AND Close button can be selected/highlighted 
AND Close returns user to Paywall Basic design (do not reference for syntax or copy) https://zpl.io/aRo4LDr

title: Restore Purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have previously purchased any subscription via an iTunes Sandbox account
AND we are still logged in to this account on the device
AND we are freshly installing the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we advance past GET STARTED 
AND on the Purchase Page we activate RESTORE
custom_expected:
THEN the restore is completed 
AND user is taken to Scores view 
AND user is entitled

title: Log in
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the Purchase Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user highlights/selects the Login button 
AND then activates the Login button
custom_expected:
THEN the user sees "MLB.TV Premium Subscribers" text when highlighted/selected 
AND the app jumps to Login page when activated

title: Back Via Menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the Log in Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Menu button on the tvOS remote
custom_expected: THEN the app jumps back to the Purchase page
